alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:10PM CST until January 03 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN...EASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHWESTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 809 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Union Church, or 23 miles west of Brookhaven, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Pleasant Hill and Mcbride around 815 PM CST. Allen and Caseyville around 820 PM CST. Barlow around 825 PM CST. Glancy and Martinsville around 835 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Roxie and Beauregard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
